Package com.deco2800.game.components.weapons.projectiles

Class ProjectileController

java.lang.Object
com.deco2800.game.components.Component
com.deco2800.game.components.weapons.projectiles.ProjectileController
Direct Known Subclasses:
BlastController, HammerProjectile
public abstract class ProjectileController
extends Component
Component that is the main controller of the projectile entity, "Blast", shot from Scepter
